title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
description:
All’s fair when love is war!
Kaguya Shinomiya and Miyuki Shirogane are two geniuses that lead the prestigious Shuchiin academy’s student council. After spending so much time together, they have developed feelings for one another but both are too prideful to be the first to confess since that would be a loss in the competition of love! Who will confess their love first?
author: Aka Akasaka
